titles.title: A bill to amend the State Justice Institute Act of 1984 regarding the disclosure of research or statistical information furnished under that Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 5/19/1987--Introduced. Amends the State Justice Institute Act of 1984 to provide that research and statistical information furnished under such Act: (1) shall be immune from legal process; (2) shall not, without the consent of the person furnishing such information, be admitted into evidence or used in any judicial, legislative, or administrative proceeding; and (3) shall not be used or revealed for purposes other than the purpose for which it was obtained.
